data.title: Watch Ronnie Wood Join The Black Crowes for “Stay With Me” in LA; ‘Happiness Bastards’ Tour On Now in Support of New Album
data.meta_description: The Black Crowes' recent tour stop at the Greek Theatre in Los Angeles featured Ronnie Wood, who guested on a cover of "Stay With Me."
data.text:
The Black Crowes are currently out on the road on a tour in support of Happiness Bastards, the new studio album from the blues/rock ensemble.

An energetic set of songs that finds the band — fronted by vocalist Chris Robinson and guitarist Rich Robinson — reinvigorated and full of life, it marks the first new set of Crowes originals in 15 years.

At the band’s tour stop at the Greek Theatre in Los Angeles on April 13, the Crowes were joined by none other than surprise guest Ronnie Wood, with the legendary guitarist helping the band slam through a faithful rendition of his Faces classic, “Stay With Me”:

And a longer video, taken by a fan up close:

The tour rolls on in the weeks ahead — and while the iconic Rolling Stones guitarist probably won’t pop up at any of these gigs, they’ll surely be a great time otu nonetheless.

Click here to pick up Happiness Bastards on CD from our Rock Cellar Store

Click here to pick up Happiness Bastards on LP from our Rock Cellar Store
